coexistence_simulator.performance_metrics.performance_metrics

Lightweight metrics for evaluating ISAC simulations.

Only NumPy is required, so the helpers run quickly inside unit tests or resource‑constrained environments.

Functions

bit_error_rate(tx_bits, rx_bits)

Return the bit‑error rate between two bit vectors.

packet_error_rate(tx_ok_flags, rx_ok_flags)

Return the packet‑error rate from Boolean success flags.

range_rmse(est_ranges, true_ranges)

Return the root‑mean‑square error of range estimates.

snr_db(signal, noise)

Return the signal‑to‑noise ratio in decibels.

spectral_utilization(occupied_bw_hz, total_bw_hz)

Return fractional spectrum occupancy.
